name: Stompa-Rompa
description:
Stompa-Rompa is my submission for the 1-Button Jam in November 2019.

  • You're the blue square
  • You can't stop running
  • Space to jump
  • Avoid Green and Pink enemies
  • Or stomp them on the head (preferred)
  • See how long you can survive. Try to get at least a minute.

The goal for me was to make a game that is frenetic, action packed, fun, beginner friendly, and difficult to master. All with only 1 button. 

This game was inspired by FPS arena shooters, like Devil Daggers. It's my  2d, platformer, 1-button interpretation of Devil Daggers.
